alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:38PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Shoal River Near Crestview affecting Okaloosa County. For the Shoal River...including Crestview...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shoal River near Crestview. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 8.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
